channel.title: Armageddon on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Armageddon on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Hollywood Flashback: When ‘Armageddon’ Billboards Blew a Hole in L.A.
item.description: On its way to becoming the highest grossing movie of 1998, the Michael Bay disaster movie sparked a city-wide panic with its all-too-real ad campaign.
